entry.title: $2500 // Charming 1 bedrm!PRIME BOERUM HILL!Near Subway/laundry,MUST SEE!
entry.content:
Apartment Features: Kitchen: Windowed; Exposed Brick; |Pet Policy: No Pets.

Building Description: Voice Intercom; Walk-Up; Pre-war; Built 1920; Townhouse; 4 Floors; 8 Apartments

Apartment Summary

This timeless one bedroom in Boerum Hill is in a fully renovated pre-war building. With all the great features we all love in terms of pre-war buildings. High ceilings, oversized windows and exposed brick. Renovations include a kitchen with beautiful white and black cabinetry and black marble countertops. stainless steel appliances with dishwasher and microwave. This is in a stellar location. Centrally located with Brooklyn Heights. Downtown Brooklyn, and Park Slope all within a short distance away. F and G train is nearby at Bergen Street. If that doesn't work for you, you also have Borough Hall nearby with plenty of other train lines nearby. With Trader Joe's around the block, Shops and restaurants all around you, you will never need to leave the area.

To schedule viewing contact show contact info
